properties.areaDesc: Northern Penobscot; Central Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 3:55AM EST until February 10 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches for
a storm total of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Northern Penobscot, Southeast Aroostook, Central
Penobscot and Northern Washington Counties.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to
newengland511.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
